article-desc201: Source: Obtainable after unlocking 6 dishes.
article-desc202: Source: Obtainable after unlocking 9 dishes.
article-desc203: Source: Obtainable after unlocking 12 dishes.
confirm-tips:
Skip the dialog?

After skipping the dialog, you can replay it in Story Recap.
desc-time-3: The event will end in 1 hour.
finish-tips: Congrats, Captain! You've completed everything in the event!
guide-step0: Step into the culinary world with Seele now!
guide-step1: These are the ingredients for today~
guide-step2:
Put ingredients into the right positions of kitchenware!
Then the shapes of ingredients will fill the squares in the middle~
guide-step3:
Wanna change to other ingredients?
Just drag the current ingredients out!
guide-step4:
Captain, it's your turn! You can make delectable dishes by combing different ingredients to fill the gray area in the middle!

Tip: Each ingredient can be repeatedly used, but you can't use only one ingredient.
guide-step5:
You'll receive new chances to cook every day!
Remember to team up with Seele in studying how to make new dishes!
home-tips: The number of dishes required to trigger the next story clip
menu-desc-101: Blending the rich aroma of black tea with the sweetness of milk, this classic beverage is both delicious and widely available.
menu-desc-102: The delightful scent of roses adds a comforting and fragrant note to this cup of milk.
menu-desc-103: With a pleasing aroma wafting through, the petals gracefully unfold in the translucent tea... So elegant, truly elegant!
menu-desc-104: A tangy fruit puree draping over delicate ice cream. You won't get sick of this combination no matter how much you indulge in it.
menu-desc-105: An intriguing drink that strikes a balance between sweetness and spiciness. Apart from its mischievous flavor, its invigorating effect is another standout feature... Don't believe me? Give it a try.
menu-desc-106: The color, texture, and taste of this beverage might seem a bit ahead of its time for humanity... Cough, it's so spicy!
menu-desc-107: A rice cracker that brings together the fragrant essence of toasted white rice, the savory richness of soy sauce, and the refreshing taste of seaweed. It can even be enjoyed as a satisfying main dish!
menu-desc-108: The richness of the seafood permeates the broth, and the rice grains soak up the delectable essense of the broth. It's utterly delicious! I'll have another bowl!
menu-desc-109: Fresh, sweet, tender, and smooth... This dish encapsulates the delightful flavors of seasonal seafood.
menu-desc-110: A traditional Shenzhou delicacy that is plump and wrapped in thin dumpling skin, fluffy and fragrant... though the folding technique might be a tad complex.
menu-desc-111: Seele's signature dish. Before you dive in, remember to drizzle a spoonful of sour cream on top of the luscious soup noodles.
menu-desc-112: Clear broth and vibrant flavors in Shenzhou noodles. It's incredible that simple ingredients can produce such an exquisite taste!
menu-desc-113: The pillowy soft cake base is complemented by smooth cream. Chilling it slightly will enhance its delightful sweetness.
menu-desc-114: Crunchy biscuits infused with the enticing aroma of butter and milk. They are a perfect companion for tea, and you won't be able to resist indulging in them!
menu-desc-115: A savory snack bursting with the flavors of bacon, onions, and cheese, ideal for satisfying sudden cravings during the afternoon.
menu-desc-116: An enigmatic and spicy street food. Never place it on the same plate with fried tofu!
rule-txt:
New web event Seele's Amazing Kitchen! begins. Step into the culinary world with Seele and prepare to create mouthwatering dishes. By arranging and combining various ingredients, you can concoct a wide range of delicacies. You can unveil brand new story clips as you unlock more dishes. Moreover, you can also win Crystals, SS Imaginon, ADV Skill Materials and more.

Time: 12:00, JUL 20 ~ 04:00, AUG 3

Required Level: 30 or higher

Rules:

1. You can drag and drop ingredients into the specific area at the center of the event screen. By skillfully filling the specific area, you can create new dishes.

2. Each dish requires a minimum of 2 different ingredients, and each ingredient can be repeatedly used.

3. Unlocking a dish consumes one chance. You will receive new chances as you enter the event every day.

4. From 12:00, JUL 20 to 03:59:59, JUL 24, you will receive 3 chances per day. From 4:00, JUL 24 to 03:59:59, AUG 3, you will receive 4 chances per day.

5. The event's main screen will showcase the three most recent dishes created by you on a table. At 04:00 daily, the dishes displayed on the table will be collected and stored in the cabinet behind.

6. As you unlock more dishes, more story clips will be unlocked. You can also play the event to get Crystals, SS Imaginon, ADV Skill Materials and more.
share-descTxt: Event Seele's Amazing Kitchen! begins! Play the event to get Crystals and more!

tips-isSame: Captain, you can't cook with only one ingredient. Please try a combination of different ingredients.
tips-item: No items obtained yet. Please try to unlock more dishes.
tips-noTicket: Captain, we've used up all the chances today. Let's try again tomorrow.
tips-notFill: Please fill the central area with ingredients.
tips-reserved: Rewards claimed. The rewards will be sent to you by mail.
tips-same: Captain, you can't cook with only one ingredient. Please try a combination of different ingredients.
tips-ticket:
You'll have 3 chances per day from 12:00, JUL 20 to 03:59, JUL 24.
You'll have 4 chances per day from 04:00, JUL 24 to 04:00, AUG 3.
The number of available chances is capped at 8.
voice-101: It has been quite popular in Schicksal lately. They say even Overseer Theresa drinks Bitter Melon Juice with it.
voice-102: This aroma makes me feel relaxed and sleepy already~
voice-103: The rose quietly blooms at the bottom of the cup...
voice-104: Humph, I did my best to make this! Will Seele like it?
voice-105: Why is it like this? We included flavors that both Seele and I enjoy...
voice-106: ...Haha, I'm really excited to see how the guests will react~
voice-107: Dehydrating the rice cake is the secret to achieving a crispy texture.
voice-108: The soup is really hot, so I have to remind everyone to eat slowly.
voice-109: How did Bronya handle seafood? Uh, I can't quite remember...
voice-110: Wrap it up, wrap it up... Oh no, the dumplings are showing the fillings!
voice-111: Let's add some large chunks of smoked beef. Bronya will definitely love them!
voice-112: The fragrance of green onions fills the air, and I can already imagine its light and refreshing taste~
voice-113: Stir, stir, stir... Oh no, I've overdone it...
voice-114: The sweetness of butter is already in the air. I'm so excited...
voice-115: Should I bake it a bit longer? I heard it's better when it's slightly charred...
voice-116: What's happening? I feel like someone is calling me "aneki"...
